Activity: Log in to the EHR system and OA system, check emails for urgent updates or requests related to influenza assessment protocols or EHR data entry procedures. Respond to any pressing emails.
Perform final patient assessments for influenza symptoms, focusing on reinforcing best practices for accurate and complete data entry within the EHR.
Review all data entered in the EHR for the week, paying special attention to patients with incomplete or inaccurate information. Correct any identified errors or omissions promptly.

Participate in a final team debriefing session to discuss the week's progress and challenges related to influenza assessment and EHR data entry. Share lessons learned and contribute to identifying solutions to systemic issues.
Contact @ehrv-1 and @dba-1 and ask them if they have any plan or adjustment for the EHR collection recently, prepare for the new collection. @ehrv-1 @dba-1 EHR Collection recent plan and adjustment.

Conduct a self-assessment of my performance throughout the week, identifying strengths and areas for improvement. Develop a personal action plan for continuous professional development in influenza assessment and EHR data entry.

Review the weekly data analysis for influenza trends prepared by @da-1 and @da-2, familiarize with common presentations and update personal strategy as needed based on those trends. @da-1 @da-2 Review of weekly data analysis of influenza trends.
Submit the final weekly report on influenza assessment and EHR data entry activities. Congratulate everyone for their hard work and prepare for next week's challenges.
